name: versification
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the form of a poem, especially one whose lines have a regular rhythm: The apparent casualness disguises the formality of the versification. He abandoned traditional versification, and wrote prose poems.
[ C ] something that has been written in the form of a poem, especially one whose lines have a regular rhythm: The Aeneid is an epic versification of the myth of Aeneas. His poems and humorous versifications were later published.
More examplesFewer examplesStanza-based versification was the norm.When the poems were written down, the versification was intact, because the verses had been handed down through the oral tradition.
